title: ARAM Skin boost's being disabled.
body:
Greetings and salutations.
 
Just wondering if any updates have occurred regarding the current situation of **Aram skin boosting**, the server status informs us it has been disabled, but it's been almost a week since. Just curious if there's any idea how much longer it intends to be disabled, or some information as to what the problem is. 

This would be greatly appreciated.
{{summoner:13}}

replies.body:
Hey there,

There is currently no official ETA on this feature being re-enabled. Rest assured it IS being worked on.

That's good to hear, thank you for the response. I look forward to it's majestic return.  
{{summoner:31}}
